text: aur (jaise ham spasht aayaten utaarate hai) usee prakaar hamane tumhaaree or ek arabee quraan kee prakaashana kee hai, taaki tum bastiyon ke kendr (makka) ko aur jo log usake chaturdik hai unako sachet kar do aur sachet karo ikattha hone ke din se, jisamen koee sandeh nahin. ek giroh jannat mein hoga aur ek giroh bhadakatee aag mein
